# Sandwiches and Wraps {-}

## Chicken Ranch Wraps {-}

### Ingredients {-}

* 8 grilled chicken breasts, cubed
* 1 and 1/4 cup sriracha ranch
* 1 and 1/2 cups mozzarella cheese
* 1 bunch cilantro, minced
* 20 8" tortillas

### Instructions {-}

Combine ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Fill each tortilla with about 1/2 cup of the mixture and roll into a burrito shape.
